QueryDefinition.Query: select m.encid, cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, case when m.encid = '' or m.encid is null then NULL else cast(replace(m.encid, 'E000','') as bigint) end as VisitOccurrenceId, m.provid, m.order_date, m.route, m.dose_frequency, m.strength, m.strength_unit, CASE WHEN m.route = 'Oral' then 4128794 WHEN m.route = 'Intravenous' then 4112421 WHEN m.route = 'Other medication route' then 45956875 WHEN m.route = 'Other injection' then 45956875 WHEN m.route = 'Subcutaneous' then 4139962 WHEN m.route = 'Inhalation' then 45956874 WHEN m.route = 'Topical' then 4231622 WHEN m.route = 'Ophthalmic' then 4157760 WHEN m.route = 'Nasal' then 4128792 WHEN m.route = 'Rectal' then 4115462 WHEN m.route = 'Urinary tract' then 4233974 WHEN m.route = 'Vaginal' then 4136280 ELSE 0 END as route_concept_id, m.quantity_of_dose, m.ndc, 'oncology' source_type from {sc}.medication_administrations as m JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND m.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where ndc is not NULL order by cast(replace(m.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
